name: Nacho Cougil
bio: I'm a Software Architect focused in projects developed with Java technologies with experience in team leadership & software project management with strong analytical and design skills.

name: Nacho Cougil
bio: I'm interested in Software Development Management Methodologies such as Agile ( XP, Scrum ) ... Also in treating people as individuals with dreams, interests and powers, not in treating people as 'workers at service' ...

name: Adela Tort
bio: Entusiasta por la tecnología, probando y aprendiendo siempre las últimas novedades. Me gusta intentar estar al día y ser capaz de diseñar y desarrollar aplicaciones aprovechando las últimas tecnologías del mercado.

name: José Guitart Ruíz
bio: IT Architect focused on Java/J2EE application design and development in several platforms and frameworks. Direct experience in design and execution of continuous integration processes.

name: Christian Sisti
bio: High-Energy, Results-Driven, Focused Software Engineer.  Interested in RestFul API, cloud platforms and micro services architectures.  Highly skilled table soccer player.

name: Miklós Csere
bio: I enjoy designing and building solid software while keeping an eye on scalability, maintainability and security. I am constantly improving myself in various technologies and best practices involving software development, coding standards and continuous integrations.
